name: LCD Logistics Sdn Bhd
summary: LCD Logistics Sdn Bhd needed a modern and professional website to better represent their logistics and freight services. Their previous website was outdated, inconsistent, and did not align with their brand quality.
I redesigned the entire site with a clean, structured layout, improved usability, and added essential new features—resulting in a more polished and trustworthy online presence.
goal: Modernise the company’s outdated website design
Improve user experience with cleaner navigation and consistent UI components
Introduce multilingual support (English & Chinese/Malay) for a wider customer reach
Strengthen brand credibility through a professional, responsive layout
Make the website more readable, structured, and aligned with their business values
challenge: The previous LCD Logistics website lacked consistency in both design and structure. Components varied from page to page, making the user experience feel fragmented and outdated. Without a unified visual identity, the site failed to reflect the professionalism of the company.

Additionally, the website did not support multiple languages, which limited its ability to communicate effectively with a wider audience in Malaysia. The client also needed the layout to stay simple while still looking modern—requiring a careful balance between usability, aesthetics, and brand alignment.
features: Multilingual support for wider audience reach
Consistent design system with reusable components
Improved content structure with SEO-friendly formatting
results: The revamped website now delivers a clean, modern, and trustworthy digital experience. Consistent UI components and a unified design system greatly enhance usability and strengthen brand credibility.

The introduction of multilingual support allows LCD Logistics to reach a broader customer base and provide information more clearly to different language groups. With improved navigation and a well-structured content layout, users can now browse services and company information more smoothly.
Overall, the new website positions LCD Logistics as a more professional, reliable, and customer-focused logistics provider.
